price: 14 « Voici le Feu que vous traitiez de mensonge, leur sera-t-il lancé.
arabic: هَٰذِهِ ٱلنَّارُ ٱلَّتِي كُنتُم بِهَا تُكَذِّبُونَ

version.title: French Translation - Rashid Maash
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French by Rashid Maash

meta.transliteration: hādhihi al-nāru allatī kuntum bihā tukadhibūna
